code: export var SET_PLAYER='SET_PLAYER';export var SET_GENDER='SET_GENDER';export var SET_SCORE='SET_SCORE';export var SET_ERROR='SET_ERROR';export var SET_CAR='SET_CAR';export var SET_TEAM='SET_TEAM';export var SET_STATUS='SET_STATUS';export var SHOW_TASKS='SHOW_TASKS';export var SET_POSITION='SET_POSITION';export var SET_MECHANIC='SET_MECHANIC';export var SET_LOADING='SHOW_LOADING';export var SHOW_LEGAL='SHOW_LEGAL';export var setPlayer=function setPlayer(player){return{type:SET_PLAYER,payload:player};};export var setGender=function setGender(gender){return{type:SET_GENDER,payload:gender};};export var setScore=function setScore(score){return{type:SET_SCORE,payload:score};};export var setError=function setError(error){return{type:SET_ERROR,payload:error};};export var setCar=function setCar(car){return{type:SET_CAR,payload:car};};export var setTeam=function setTeam(team){return{type:SET_TEAM,payload:team};};export var setStatus=function setStatus(status){return{type:SET_STATUS,payload:status};};export var showTasks=function showTasks(visibility){return{type:SHOW_TASKS,payload:visibility};};export var setWheelPosition=function setWheelPosition(position){return{type:SET_POSITION,payload:position};};export var setMechanic=function setMechanic(id){return{type:SET_MECHANIC,payload:id};};export var setLoading=function setLoading(status){return{type:SET_LOADING,payload:status};};export var showLegal=function showLegal(visibility){return{type:SHOW_LEGAL,payload:visibility};};
